title: Mexico : foreign direct investment ( FDI ) 3rd quarter 2019 , by country
summary: This statistic shows the number of cases and deaths among health care workers related to the 2014 - 2015 ebola outbreak in west africa ( and the DR Congo ) . As of 4 , 2015 , there have been 378 cases among health care workers in liberia , resulting in 192 deaths . The ebola virus causes extremely severe hemorrhagic fever and is considered a Risk Group 4 Pathogen by the World health Organization ( WHO ) .
gold: In the third quarter of 2019 , less than one third of foreign direct investments ( FDI ) in Mexico came from the United States . During that same period , nearly 27 percent of Mexican FDI originated from Spain . Moreover , FDI in Mexico throughout the second quarter of each year has decreased lately .
